original: Majjhima Nikāya 30
analyzed: majjhima nikāya

original: Cūḷasāropamasutta
analyzed: cūḍasāra upama sutta

original: Evaṁ me sutaṁ—
analyzed: evam me suta

original: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: ekam samayam bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Atha kho piṅgalakoccho brāhmaṇo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavatā saddhiṁ sammodi.
analyzed: atha kho piṅgalakocchaḥ brāhmaṇaḥ yena bhagavā tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā bhagavatā saddhim sammodi

original: Sammodanīyaṁ kathaṁ sāraṇīyaṁ vītisāretvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi. Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho piṅgalakoccho brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: sammodanīyam katham sāraṇīyam vītisāretvā ekamantam nisīdi ekamantam nisinnaḥ kho piṅgalakocchaḥ brāhmaṇaḥ bhagavantam etat avoca

original: “yeme, bho gotama, samaṇabrāhmaṇā saṅghino gaṇino gaṇācariyā ñātā yasassino titthakarā sādhusammatā, bahujanassa,
analyzed: ye me bho gotama samaṇa brāhmaṇā saṅghinaḥ gaṇinaḥ gaṇa ācariyā ñātā yasassinaḥ titthakarā sādhu sammatā bahu janassa

original: seyyathidaṁ—pūraṇo kassapo, makkhali gosālo, ajito kesakambalo, pakudho kaccāyano, sañcayo belaṭṭhaputto, nigaṇṭho nāṭaputto,
analyzed: seyyathidapūraṇaḥ kassapaḥ makkhali gosālaḥ ajitaḥ kesakambalo pakudhaḥ kaccāyano sañcayaḥ belaṭṭhaputto nigaṇṭhaḥ nāṭaputto

original: sabbete sakāya paṭiññāya abbhaññaṁsu sabbeva nābbhaññaṁsu, udāhu ekacce abbhaññaṁsu ekacce nābbhaññaṁsū”ti?
analyzed: sabbe ete sakāya paṭiññāya abbhaññasu sabbe iva na abbhaññasu udāhu ekacce abbhaññasu ekacce na abbhaññasu iti

original: “Alaṁ, brāhmaṇa, tiṭṭhatetaṁ—
analyzed: ala brāhmaṇa tiṭṭhata ita

original: sabbete sakāya paṭiññāya abbhaññaṁsu sabbeva nābbhaññaṁsu, udāhu ekacce abbhaññaṁsu ekacce nābbhaññaṁsūti.
analyzed: sabbe ete sakāya paṭiññāya abbhaññasu sabbe iva na abbhaññasu udāhu ekacce abbhaññasu ekacce na abbhaññasu iti

original: Dhammaṁ te, brāhmaṇa, desessāmi,
analyzed: dhammam te brāhmaṇa desessāmi

original: taṁ suṇāhi, sādhukaṁ manasi karohi, bhāsissāmī”ti.
analyzed: tam suṇāhi sādhukam manasi karohi bhāsissāmi iti

original: “Evaṁ, bho”ti kho piṅgalakoccho brāhmaṇo bhagavato paccassosi.
analyzed: eva bhoti kho piṅgalakocchaḥ brāhmaṇaḥ bhagavato paccassosi

original: Bhagavā etadavoca:
analyzed: bhagavān etat avoca

original: “Seyyathāpi, brāhmaṇa, puriso sāratthiko sāragavesī sārapariyesanaṁ caramāno mahato
analyzed: seyyathā api brāhmaṇa purisaḥ sāratthikaḥ sāra gavesī sāra pariyesanam caramānaḥ mahataḥ

original: rukkhassa tiṭṭhato sāravato atikkammeva sāraṁ atikkamma phegguṁ atikkamma tacaṁ atikkamma
analyzed: rukkhassa tiṭṭhataḥ sāravataḥ atikkamma iva sāram atikkamma pheggum atikkamma tacam atikkamma

original: papaṭikaṁ, sākhāpalāsaṁ chetvā ādāya pakkameyya ‘sāran’ti maññamāno.
analyzed: papaṭika sākhā palāsam chetvā ādāya pakkameyya sāranti maññamānaḥ

original: Tamenaṁ cakkhumā puriso disvā evaṁ vadeyya:
analyzed: tam enam cakkhumā purisaḥ disvā evam vadeyya

original: ‘na vatāyaṁ bhavaṁ puriso aññāsi sāraṁ, na aññāsi phegguṁ, na aññāsi tacaṁ, na aññāsi papaṭikaṁ, na aññāsi sākhāpalāsaṁ.
analyzed: na vata ayam bhavam purisaḥ aññāsi sāra na aññāsi pheggu na aññāsi taca na aññāsi papaṭika na aññāsi sākhāpalāsa

original: Tathā hayaṁ bhavaṁ puriso sāratthiko sāragavesī sārapariyesanaṁ caramāno mahato rukkhassa
analyzed: tathā hayam bhavam purisaḥ sāratthikaḥ sāra gavesī sāra pariyesanam caramānaḥ mahato rukkhassa

original: tiṭṭhato sāravato atikkammeva sāraṁ atikkamma phegguṁ atikkamma tacaṁ atikkamma papaṭikaṁ,
analyzed: tiṭṭhataḥ sāravataḥ atikkamma iva sāram atikkamma pheggum atikkamma tacam atikkamma papaṭika

original: sākhāpalāsaṁ chetvā ādāya pakkanto “sāran”ti maññamāno.
analyzed: sākhā palāsam chetvā ādāya pakkantaḥ sāranti maññamāno

original: Yañcassa sārena sārakaraṇīyaṁ tañcassa atthaṁ nānubhavissatī’ti.
analyzed: yat ca assa sārena sāra karaṇīyam tat ca assa attham na anubhavissati iti

original: Seyyathāpi vā pana, brāhmaṇa, puriso sāratthiko sāragavesī sārapariyesanaṁ caramāno
analyzed: seyyathā api vā pana brāhmaṇa purisaḥ sāratthikaḥ sāra gavesī sāra pariyesanam caramānaḥ

original: mahato rukkhassa tiṭṭhato sāravato atikkammeva sāraṁ atikkamma phegguṁ atikkamma
analyzed: mahato rukkhassa tiṭṭhataḥ sāravataḥ atikkamma iva sāram atikkamma pheggum atikkamma

original: tacaṁ, papaṭikaṁ chetvā ādāya pakkameyya ‘sāran’ti maññamāno.
analyzed: chetvā ādāya pakkameyya sāranti maññamāno

original: Tamenaṁ cakkhumā puriso disvā evaṁ vadeyya:
analyzed: tam enam cakkhumā purisaḥ disvā evam vadeyya

original: ‘na vatāyaṁ bhavaṁ puriso aññāsi sāraṁ, na aññāsi phegguṁ, na aññāsi tacaṁ, na aññāsi papaṭikaṁ, na aññāsi sākhāpalāsaṁ.
analyzed: na vata ayam bhavam purisaḥ aññāsi sāra na aññāsi pheggu na aññāsi taca na aññāsi papaṭika na aññāsi sākhāpalāsa

original: Tathā hayaṁ bhavaṁ puriso sāratthiko sāragavesī sārapariyesanaṁ caramāno mahato rukkhassa
analyzed: tathā hayam bhavam purisaḥ sāratthikaḥ sāra gavesī sāra pariyesanam caramānaḥ mahato rukkhassa

original: tiṭṭhato sāravato atikkammeva sāraṁ atikkamma phegguṁ atikkamma tacaṁ papaṭikaṁ chetvā
analyzed: tiṭṭhataḥ sāravataḥ atikkamma iva sāram atikkamma pheggum atikkamma tacam papaṭikam chetvā

original: ādāya pakkanto “sāran”ti maññamāno.
analyzed: ādāya pakkantaḥ sāranti maññamāno

original: Yañcassa sārena sārakaraṇīyaṁ tañcassa atthaṁ nānubhavissatī’ti.
analyzed: yat ca assa sārena sāra karaṇīyam tat ca assa attham na anubhavissati iti

original: Seyyathāpi vā pana, brāhmaṇa, puriso sāratthiko sāragavesī sārapariyesanaṁ caramāno
analyzed: seyyathā api vā pana brāhmaṇa purisaḥ sāratthikaḥ sāra gavesī sāra pariyesanam caramānaḥ

original: mahato rukkhassa tiṭṭhato sāravato atikkammeva sāraṁ atikkamma phegguṁ, tacaṁ chetvā
analyzed: mahato rukkhassa tiṭṭhataḥ sāravataḥ atikkamma iva sāram atikkamma pheggu tacam chetvā

original: ādāya pakkameyya ‘sāran’ti maññamāno.
analyzed: ādāya pakkameyya sāranti maññamānaḥ

original: Tamenaṁ cakkhumā puriso disvā evaṁ vadeyya:
analyzed: tam enam cakkhumā purisaḥ disvā evam vadeyya

original: ‘na vatāyaṁ bhavaṁ puriso aññāsi sāraṁ, na aññāsi phegguṁ, na aññāsi tacaṁ, na aññāsi papaṭikaṁ, na aññāsi sākhāpalāsaṁ.
analyzed: na vata ayam bhavam purisaḥ aññāsi sāra na aññāsi pheggu na aññāsi taca na aññāsi papaṭika na aññāsi sākhāpalāsa

original: Tathā hayaṁ bhavaṁ puriso sāratthiko sāragavesī sārapariyesanaṁ caramāno mahato rukkhassa
analyzed: tathā hayam bhavam purisaḥ sāratthikaḥ sāra gavesī sāra pariyesanam caramānaḥ mahato rukkhassa

original: tiṭṭhato sāravato atikkammeva sāraṁ atikkamma phegguṁ, tacaṁ chetvā ādāya pakkanto
analyzed: tiṭṭhataḥ sāravataḥ atikkamma iva sāram atikkamma pheggu tacam chetvā ādāya pakkantaḥ

original: “sāran”ti maññamāno.
analyzed: sāranti maññamānaḥ

original: Yañcassa sārena sārakaraṇīyaṁ tañcassa atthaṁ nānubhavissatī’ti.
analyzed: yat ca assa sārena sāra karaṇīyam tat ca assa attham na anubhavissati iti

original: Seyyathāpi vā pana, brāhmaṇa, puriso sāratthiko sāragavesī sārapariyesanaṁ caramāno
analyzed: seyyathā api vā pana brāhmaṇa purisaḥ sāratthikaḥ sāra gavesī sāra pariyesanam caramānaḥ

original: mahato rukkhassa tiṭṭhato sāravato atikkammeva sāraṁ, phegguṁ chetvā ādāya pakkameyya
analyzed: mahato rukkhassa tiṭṭhataḥ sāravataḥ atikkamma iva sāra pheggum chetvā ādāya pakkameyya

original: ‘sāran’ti maññamāno.
analyzed: sāranti maññamānaḥ

original: Tamenaṁ cakkhumā puriso disvā evaṁ vadeyya:
analyzed: tam enam cakkhumā purisaḥ disvā evam vadeyya

original: ‘na vatāyaṁ bhavaṁ puriso aññāsi sāraṁ, na aññāsi phegguṁ, na aññāsi tacaṁ, na aññāsi papaṭikaṁ, na aññāsi sākhāpalāsaṁ.
analyzed: na vata ayam bhavam purisaḥ aññāsi sāra na aññāsi pheggu na aññāsi taca na aññāsi papaṭika na aññāsi sākhāpalāsa

original: Tathā hayaṁ bhavaṁ puriso sāratthiko sāragavesī sārapariyesanaṁ caramāno mahato rukkhassa tiṭṭhato sāravato atikkammeva sāraṁ, phegguṁ chetvā ādāya pakkanto “sāran”ti maññamāno.
analyzed: tathā hayam bhavam purisaḥ sāratthikaḥ sāra gavesī sāra pariyesanam caramānaḥ mahato rukkhassa tiṭṭhataḥ sāravataḥ atikkamma iva sāra pheggum chetvā ādāya pakkantaḥ sāranti maññamāno

original: Yañcassa sārena sārakaraṇīyaṁ tañcassa atthaṁ nānubhavissatī’ti.
analyzed: yat ca assa sārena sāra karaṇīyam tat ca assa attham na anubhavissati iti

original: Seyyathāpi vā pana, brāhmaṇa, puriso sāratthiko sāragavesī sārapariyesanaṁ caramāno mahato rukkhassa tiṭṭhato sāravato sāraññeva chetvā ādāya pakkameyya ‘sāran’ti jānamāno.
analyzed: seyyathā api vā pana brāhmaṇa purisaḥ sāratthikaḥ sāra gavesī sāra pariyesanam caramānaḥ mahato rukkhassa tiṭṭhataḥ sāravataḥ sāraññā iva chetvā ādāya pakkameyya sāranti jānamāno

original: Tamenaṁ cakkhumā puriso disvā evaṁ vadeyya:
analyzed: tam enam cakkhumā purisaḥ disvā evam vadeyya

original: ‘aññāsi vatāyaṁ bhavaṁ puriso sāraṁ, aññāsi phegguṁ, aññāsi tacaṁ, aññāsi papaṭikaṁ, aññāsi sākhāpalāsaṁ.
analyzed: aññāsi vata ayam bhavam puriso sāra aññāsi pheggu aññāsi taca aññāsi papaṭika aññāsi sākhāpalāsa

original: Tathā hayaṁ bhavaṁ puriso sāratthiko sāragavesī sārapariyesanaṁ caramāno mahato rukkhassa tiṭṭhato sāravato sāraññeva chetvā ādāya pakkanto “sāran”ti jānamāno.
analyzed: tathā hayam bhavam purisaḥ sāratthikaḥ sāra gavesī sāra pariyesanam caramānaḥ mahato rukkhassa tiṭṭhataḥ sāravataḥ sāraññā iva chetvā ādāya pakkantaḥ sāranti jānamānaḥ

original: Yañcassa sārena sārakaraṇīyaṁ tañcassa atthaṁ anubhavissatī’ti.
analyzed: yat ca assa sārena sāra karaṇīyam tat ca assa attham anubhavissati iti

original: Evameva kho, brāhmaṇa, idhekacco puggalo saddhā agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajito hoti:
analyzed: evam eva kho brāhmaṇa idha ekaccaḥ puggalo saddhā agārasma anagāriyam pabbajitaḥ hoti

original: ‘otiṇṇomhi jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi, dukkhotiṇṇo dukkhapareto,
analyzed: otiṇṇomhi jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi dukkha utiṇṇaḥ dukkha paretaḥ

original: appeva nāma imassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa antakiriyā paññāyethā’ti.
analyzed: appā iva nāma imassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa anta kiriyā paññāyetha ati

original: So evaṁ pabbajito samāno lābhasakkārasilokaṁ abhinibbatteti.
analyzed: saḥ evam pabbajitaḥ samānaḥ lābha sakkāra silokam abhinibbattā iti

original: So tena lābhasakkārasilokena attamano hoti paripuṇṇasaṅkappo.
analyzed: saḥ tena lābha sakkāra silokena atta manaḥ hoti paripuṇṇa saṅkappaḥ

original: So tena lābhasakkārasilokena attānukkaṁseti, paraṁ vambheti:
analyzed: saḥ tena lābha sakkāra si lokena attā anukkaseti param vambheti

original: ‘ahamasmi lābhasakkārasilokavā, ime panaññe bhikkhū appaññātā appesakkhā’ti.
analyzed: aham asmi lābha sakkāra silokavā ime pana aññe bhikkhū appaññātā appesakkhā ati

original: Lābhasakkārasilokena ca ye aññe dhammā uttaritarā ca paṇītatarā ca tesaṁ dhammānaṁ sacchikiriyāya na chandaṁ janeti, na vāyamati, olīnavuttiko ca hoti sāthaliko.
analyzed: lābha sakkāra silokena ca ye aññe dhammā uttaritarā ca paṇītatarā ca tesam dhammānam sacchikiriyāya na chandam janeti na vā āyamati olīna vuttiko ca hoti sāthaliko

original: Seyyathāpi so, brāhmaṇa, puriso sāratthiko sāragavesī sārapariyesanaṁ caramāno mahato
analyzed: seyyathā api saḥ brāhmaṇa purisaḥ sāratthikaḥ sāra gavesī sāra pariyesanam caramānaḥ mahataḥ

original: rukkhassa tiṭṭhato sāravato atikkammeva sāraṁ atikkamma phegguṁ atikkamma tacaṁ atikkamma
analyzed: rukkhassa tiṭṭhataḥ sāravataḥ atikkamma iva sāram atikkamma pheggum atikkamma tacam atikkamma

original: papaṭikaṁ, sākhāpalāsaṁ chetvā ādāya pakkanto ‘sāran’ti maññamāno.
analyzed: papaṭika sākhā palāsam chetvā ādāya pakkantaḥ sāranti maññamāno

original: Yañcassa sārena sārakaraṇīyaṁ tañcassa atthaṁ nānubhavissati.
analyzed: yat ca assa sārena sāra karaṇīyam tat ca assa attham na anubhavissati

original: Tathūpamāhaṁ, brāhmaṇa, imaṁ puggalaṁ vadāmi.
analyzed: tathūpamā āha brāhmaṇaḥ imam puggalam vadāmi

original: Idha pana, brāhmaṇa, ekacco puggalo saddhā agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajito hoti:
analyzed: idha pana brāhmaṇaḥ ekaccaḥ puggalo saddhā agārasma anagāriyam pabbajitaḥ hoti

original: ‘otiṇṇomhi jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi, dukkhotiṇṇo dukkhapareto,
analyzed: otiṇṇomhi jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi dukkha utiṇṇaḥ dukkha paretaḥ

original: appeva nāma imassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa antakiriyā paññāyethā’ti.
analyzed: appā iva nāma imassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa anta kiriyā paññāyetha ati

original: So evaṁ pabbajito samāno lābhasakkārasilokaṁ abhinibbatteti.
analyzed: saḥ evam pabbajitaḥ samānaḥ lābha sakkāra silokam abhinibbattā iti

original: So tena lābhasakkārasilokena na attamano hoti na paripuṇṇasaṅkappo.
analyzed: saḥ tena lābha sakkāra silokena na atta manaḥ hoti na paripuṇṇa saṅkappaḥ

original: So tena lābhasakkārasilokena na attānukkaṁseti, na paraṁ vambheti.
analyzed: saḥ tena lābha sakkāra silokena na attā anukkaseti na param vambheti

original: Lābhasakkārasilokena ca ye aññe dhammā uttaritarā ca paṇītatarā ca tesaṁ dhammānaṁ sacchikiriyāya chandaṁ janeti, vāyamati, anolīnavuttiko ca hoti asāthaliko.
analyzed: lābha sakkāra silokena ca ye aññe dhammā uttaritarā ca paṇītatarā ca tesam dhammānam sacchikiriyāya chandam janeti vāyamati anolīnavuttiko ca hoti a sāthaliko

original: So sīlasampadaṁ ārādheti.
analyzed: saḥ sīla sampadam ārādha iti

original: So tāya sīlasampadāya attamano hoti, paripuṇṇasaṅkappo.
analyzed: saḥ tāya sīla sampadāya atta manaḥ hoti paripuṇṇa saṅkappaḥ

original: So tāya sīlasampadāya attānukkaṁseti, paraṁ vambheti:
analyzed: saḥ tāya sīla sampadāya attā anukkasā iti param vambheti

original: ‘ahamasmi sīlavā kalyāṇadhammo, ime panaññe bhikkhū dussīlā pāpadhammā’ti.
analyzed: aham asmi sīlavā kalyāṇa dhammo ime pana aññe bhikkhū dussīlā pāpa dhammā

original: Sīlasampadāya ca ye aññe dhammā uttaritarā ca paṇītatarā ca tesaṁ dhammānaṁ sacchikiriyāya na chandaṁ janeti, na vāyamati, olīnavuttiko ca hoti sāthaliko.
analyzed: sīla sampadāya ca ye aññe dhammāḥ uttaritarā ca paṇītatarā ca tesam dhammānam sacchikiriyāya na chandam janeti na vā āyamati olīnavuttikaḥ ca hoti sāthaliko

analyzed: rukkhassa tiṭṭhataḥ sāravataḥ atikkamma iva sāram atikkamma pheggum atikkamma taca

analyzed: papaṭikam chetvā ādāya pakkantaḥ sāranti maññamāno

analyzed: appā iva nāma imassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa anta kiriyā paññāyetha ati

analyzed: saḥ evam pabbajitaḥ samānaḥ lābha sakkāra silokam abhinibbattā iti

original: So tena lābhasakkārasilokena na attamano hoti, na paripuṇṇasaṅkappo.
analyzed: saḥ tena lābha sakkāra silokena na atta manaḥ hoti na paripuṇṇa saṅkappaḥ

original: So tena lābhasakkārasilokena na attānukkaṁseti, na paraṁ vambheti.
analyzed: saḥ tena lābha sakkāra silokena na attā anukkaseti na param vambheti

original: Lābhasakkārasilokena ca ye aññe dhammā uttaritarā ca paṇītatarā ca tesaṁ dhammānaṁ sacchikiriyāya chandaṁ janeti, vāyamati, anolīnavuttiko ca hoti asāthaliko.
analyzed: lābha sakkāra silokena ca ye aññe dhammā uttaritarā ca paṇītatarā ca tesam dhammānam sacchikiriyāya chandam janeti vāyamati anolīnavuttiko ca hoti a sāthaliko

original: So sīlasampadaṁ ārādheti.
analyzed: saḥ sīla sampadam ārādha iti

original: So tāya sīlasampadāya attamano hoti no ca kho paripuṇṇasaṅkappo.
analyzed: saḥ tāya sīla sampadāya atta manaḥ hoti no ca kho paripuṇṇa saṅkappaḥ

original: So tāya sīlasampadāya na attānukkaṁseti, na paraṁ vambheti.
analyzed: saḥ tāya sīla sampadāya na attā anukkaseti na param vambheti

original: Sīlasampadāya ca ye aññe dhammā uttaritarā ca paṇītatarā ca tesaṁ dhammānaṁ sacchikiriyāya chandaṁ janeti, vāyamati, anolīnavuttiko ca hoti asāthaliko.
analyzed: sīla sampadāya ca ye aññe dhammāḥ uttaritarā ca paṇītatarā ca tesam dhammānam sacchikiriyāya chandam janeti vāyamati anolīnavuttiko ca hoti a sāthaliko

original: So samādhisampadaṁ ārādheti.
analyzed: saḥ samādhi sampadam ārādha iti

original: So tāya samādhisampadāya attamano hoti, paripuṇṇasaṅkappo.
analyzed: saḥ tāya samādhi sampadāya atta manaḥ hoti paripuṇṇa saṅkappaḥ

original: So tāya samādhisampadāya attānukkaṁseti, paraṁ vambheti:
analyzed: saḥ tāya samādhi sampadāya attā anukkasā iti param vambheti

original: ‘ahamasmi samāhito ekaggacitto, ime panaññe bhikkhū asamāhitā vibbhantacittā’ti.
analyzed: aham asmi samāhitaḥ ekagga cittaḥ ime pana aññe bhikkhū asamāhitā vibbhanta cittā ti

original: Samādhisampadāya ca ye aññe dhammā uttaritarā ca paṇītatarā ca, tesaṁ dhammānaṁ sacchikiriyāya na chandaṁ janeti, na vāyamati, olīnavuttiko ca hoti sāthaliko.
analyzed: samādhi sampadāya ca ye aññe dhammāḥ uttaritarā ca paṇītatarā ca tesam dhammānam sacchikiriyāya na chandam janeti na vā āyamati olīna vuttikaḥ ca hoti sāthaliko

original: Seyyathāpi so, brāhmaṇa, puriso sāratthiko sāragavesī sārapariyesanaṁ caramāno mahato
analyzed: seyyathā api saḥ brāhmaṇa purisaḥ sāratthikaḥ sāra gavesī sāra pariyesanam caramānaḥ mahataḥ

original: rukkhassa tiṭṭhato sāravato atikkammeva sāraṁ atikkamma phegguṁ, tacaṁ chetvā ādāya
analyzed: rukkhassa tiṭṭhataḥ sāravataḥ atikkamma iva sāram atikkamma pheggu tacam chetvā ādāya

original: pakkanto ‘sāran’ti maññamāno.
analyzed: pakkantaḥ sāranti maññamāno

original: Yañcassa sārena sārakaraṇīyaṁ tañcassa atthaṁ nānubhavissati.
analyzed: yat ca assa sārena sāra karaṇīyam tat ca assa attham na anubhavissati

original: Tathūpamāhaṁ, brāhmaṇa, imaṁ puggalaṁ vadāmi.
analyzed: tathūpamā āha brāhmaṇaḥ imam puggalam vadāmi

original: Idha pana, brāhmaṇa, ekacco puggalo saddhā agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajito hoti:
analyzed: idha pana brāhmaṇaḥ ekaccaḥ puggalo saddhā agārasma anagāriyam pabbajitaḥ hoti

original: ‘otiṇṇomhi jātiyā jarāya maraṇena …pe…
analyzed: otiṇṇomhi jātiyā jarāya maraṇena pe

original: antakiriyā paññāyethā’ti.
analyzed: anta kiriyā paññāyetha ati

analyzed: saḥ evam pabbajitaḥ samānaḥ lābha sakkāra silokam abhinibbattā iti

analyzed: saḥ tena lābha sakkāra silokena na attā anukkaseti na param vambheti

analyzed: sīla sampadāya ca ye aññe dhammāḥ uttaritarā ca paṇītatarā ca tesam dhammānam sacchikiriyāya chandam janeti vāyamati anolīnavuttiko ca hoti a sāthaliko

original: So samādhisampadaṁ ārādheti.
analyzed: saḥ samādhi sampadam ārādha iti

original: So tāya samādhisampadāya attamano hoti, no ca kho paripuṇṇasaṅkappo.
analyzed: saḥ tāya samādhi sampadāya atta manaḥ hoti no ca kho paripuṇṇa saṅkappaḥ

original: So tāya samādhisampadāya na attānukkaṁseti, na paraṁ vambheti.
analyzed: saḥ tāya samādhi sampadāya na attā anukkaseti na param vambheti

original: Samādhisampadāya ca ye aññe dhammā uttaritarā ca paṇītatarā ca tesaṁ dhammānaṁ sacchikiriyāya chandaṁ janeti, vāyamati, anolīnavuttiko ca hoti asāthaliko.
analyzed: samādhi sampadāya ca ye aññe dhammāḥ uttaritarā ca paṇītatarā ca tesam dhammānam sacchikiriyāya chandam janeti vāyamati anolīnavuttiko ca hoti a sāthaliko

analyzed: saḥ ñāṇa dassanam ārādheti

original: So tena ñāṇadassanena attamano hoti, paripuṇṇasaṅkappo.
analyzed: saḥ tena ñāṇa dassanena atta manaḥ hoti paripuṇṇa saṅkappaḥ

original: So tena ñāṇadassanena attānukkaṁseti, paraṁ vambheti:
analyzed: saḥ tena ñāṇa dassanena attā anukkaseti param vambheti

original: So tena ñāṇadassanena na attānukkaṁseti, na paraṁ vambheti.
analyzed: saḥ tena ñāṇa dassanena na attā anukkaseti na param vambheti

original: Ñāṇadassanena ca ye aññe dhammā uttaritarā ca paṇītatarā ca tesaṁ dhammānaṁ sacchikiriyāya chandaṁ janeti, vāyamati, anolīnavuttiko ca hoti asāthaliko.
analyzed: ñāṇa dassanena ca ye aññe dhammā uttaritarā ca paṇītatarā ca tesam dhammānam sacchikiriyāya chandam janeti vāyamati anolīnavuttiko ca hoti a sāthaliko

original: Katame ca, brāhmaṇa, dhammā ñāṇadassanena uttaritarā ca paṇītatarā ca?
analyzed: katame ca brāhmaṇa dhammā ñāṇa dassanena uttaritarā ca paṇītatarā ca

original: Idha, brāhmaṇa, bhikkhu vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkaṁ savicāraṁ vivekajaṁ pītisukhaṁ paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati.
analyzed: idha brāhmaṇa bhikkhu vivicca iva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi sa vitakkam sa vicāram viveka jam pīti sukham paṭhamam jhānam upasampajja viharati

original: Ayampi kho, brāhmaṇa, dhammo ñāṇadassanena uttaritaro ca paṇītataro ca.
analyzed: ayam pi kho brāhmaṇa dhammaḥ ñāṇa dassanena uttaritaraḥ ca paṇītataraḥ ca

original: Puna caparaṁ, brāhmaṇa, bhikkhu vitakkavicārānaṁ vūpasamā ajjhattaṁ sampasādanaṁ cetaso ekodibhāvaṁ avitakkaṁ avicāraṁ samādhijaṁ pītisukhaṁ dutiyaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati.
analyzed: puna capara brāhmaṇa bhikkhu vitakka vicārānam vūpasamā ajjhattam sampasādanam cetasaḥ eka udi bhāvam a vitakkam a vicāram samādhi jam pīti sukham dutiyam jhānam upasampajja viharati

original: Ayampi kho, brāhmaṇa, dhammo ñāṇadassanena uttaritaro ca paṇītataro ca.
analyzed: ayam pi kho brāhmaṇa dhammaḥ ñāṇa dassanena uttaritaraḥ ca paṇītataraḥ ca

original: Puna caparaṁ, brāhmaṇa, bhikkhu pītiyā ca virāgā upekkhako ca viharati, sato ca sampajāno
analyzed: puna capara brāhmaṇa bhikkhu pītiyā ca virāgā upekkhako ca viharati sataḥ ca sampajāno

original: sukhañca kāyena paṭisaṁvedeti, yaṁ taṁ ariyā ācikkhanti: ‘upekkhako satimā sukhavihārī’ti
analyzed: sukham ca kāyena paṭisavedeti yam tam ariyāḥ ācikkhanti upekkhakaḥ satimā sukha vihārī iti

original: tatiyaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati.
analyzed: tatiyam jhānam upasampajja viharati

original: Ayampi kho, brāhmaṇa, dhammo ñāṇadassanena uttaritaro ca paṇītataro ca.
analyzed: ayam pi kho brāhmaṇa dhammaḥ ñāṇa dassanena uttaritaraḥ ca paṇītataraḥ ca

original: Puna caparaṁ, brāhmaṇa, bhikkhu sukhassa ca pahānā dukkhassa ca pahānā pubbeva somanassadomanassānaṁ
analyzed: puna capara brāhmaṇa bhikkhu sukhassa ca pahānā dukkhassa ca pahānā pubbā iva somanassa domanassāna

original: atthaṅgamā adukkhamasukhaṁ upekkhāsatipārisuddhiṁ catutthaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati.
analyzed: atthaṅgamā adukkham asukham upekkhā sati pārisuddhim catuttham jhānam upasampajja viharati

original: Ayampi kho, brāhmaṇa, dhammo ñāṇadassanena uttaritaro ca paṇītataro ca.
analyzed: ayam pi kho brāhmaṇa dhammaḥ ñāṇa dassanena uttaritaraḥ ca paṇītataraḥ ca

original: Puna caparaṁ, brāhmaṇa, bhikkhu sabbaso rūpasaññānaṁ samatikkamā paṭighasaññānaṁ atthaṅgamā nānattasaññānaṁ amanasikārā ‘ananto ākāso’ti ākāsānañcāyatanaṁ upasampajja viharati.
analyzed: puna capara brāhmaṇa bhikkhu sabbaso rūpa saññānam samatikkamā paṭigha saññānam atthaṅgamā nānatta saññānam amanasikārā anantaḥ ākāsaḥ ti ākāsānañcāyatanam upasampajja viharati

original: Ayampi kho, brāhmaṇa, dhammo ñāṇadassanena uttaritaro ca paṇītataro ca.
analyzed: ayam pi kho brāhmaṇa dhammaḥ ñāṇa dassanena uttaritaraḥ ca paṇītataraḥ ca

original: Puna caparaṁ, brāhmaṇa, bhikkhu sabbaso ākāsānañcāyatanaṁ samatikkamma ‘anantaṁ viññāṇan’ti viññāṇañcāyatanaṁ upasampajja viharati.
analyzed: puna capara brāhmaṇa bhikkhu sabbaso ākāsānañcāyatanam samatikkamma anantam viññāṇanti viññāṇañcāyatanam upasampajja viharati

original: Ayampi kho, brāhmaṇa, dhammo ñāṇadassanena uttaritaro ca paṇītataro ca.
analyzed: ayam pi kho brāhmaṇa dhammaḥ ñāṇa dassanena uttaritaraḥ ca paṇītataraḥ ca

original: Puna caparaṁ, brāhmaṇa, bhikkhu sabbaso viññāṇañcāyatanaṁ samatikkamma ‘natthi kiñcī’ti ākiñcaññāyatanaṁ upasampajja viharati.
analyzed: puna capara brāhmaṇa bhikkhu sabbasas viññāṇañca āyatanam samatikkamma na atthi kiñci iti ākiñcaññāyatanam upasampajja viharati

original: Ayampi kho, brāhmaṇa, dhammo ñāṇadassanena uttaritaro ca paṇītataro ca.
analyzed: ayam pi kho brāhmaṇa dhammaḥ ñāṇa dassanena uttaritaraḥ ca paṇītataraḥ ca

original: Puna caparaṁ, brāhmaṇa, bhikkhu sabbaso ākiñcaññāyatanaṁ samatikkamma nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṁ upasampajja viharati.
analyzed: puna capara brāhmaṇa bhikkhu sabbaso ākiñcaññāyatanam samatikkamma nevasaññānāsaññāyatanam upasampajja viharati

original: Ayampi kho, brāhmaṇa, dhammo ñāṇadassanena uttaritaro ca paṇītataro ca.
analyzed: ayam pi kho brāhmaṇa dhammaḥ ñāṇa dassanena uttaritaraḥ ca paṇītataraḥ ca

original: Puna caparaṁ, brāhmaṇa, bhikkhu sabbaso nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṁ samatikkamma saññāvedayitanirodhaṁ upasampajja viharati, paññāya cassa disvā āsavā parikkhīṇā honti.
analyzed: puna capara brāhmaṇa bhikkhu sabbasas nevasaññānāsaññāyatanam samatikkamma saññā vedayita nirodham upasampajja viharati paññāya cassa disvā āsavā parikkhīṇāḥ honti

original: Ayampi kho, brāhmaṇa, dhammo ñāṇadassanena uttaritaro ca paṇītataro ca.
analyzed: ayam pi kho brāhmaṇa dhammaḥ ñāṇa dassanena uttaritaraḥ ca paṇītataraḥ ca

original: Ime kho, brāhmaṇa, dhammā ñāṇadassanena uttaritarā ca paṇītatarā ca.
analyzed: ime kho brāhmaṇa dhammā ñāṇa dassanena uttaritarā ca paṇītatarā ca

original: Seyyathāpi so, brāhmaṇa, puriso sāratthiko sāragavesī sārapariyesanaṁ caramāno mahato rukkhassa tiṭṭhato sāravato sāraṁyeva chetvā ādāya pakkanto ‘sāran’ti jānamāno.
analyzed: seyyathā api saḥ brāhmaṇa purisaḥ sāratthikaḥ sāra gavesī sāra pariyesanam caramānaḥ mahato rukkhassa tiṭṭhataḥ sāravataḥ sārayā iva chetvā ādāya pakkantaḥ sāranti jānamānaḥ

original: Yañcassa sārena sārakaraṇīyaṁ tañcassa atthaṁ anubhavissati.
analyzed: yat ca assa sārena sāra karaṇīyam tat ca assa attham anubhavissati

original: Tathūpamāhaṁ, brāhmaṇa, imaṁ puggalaṁ vadāmi.
analyzed: tathūpamā āha brāhmaṇaḥ imam puggalam vadāmi

original: Iti kho, brāhmaṇa, nayidaṁ brahmacariyaṁ lābhasakkārasilokānisaṁsaṁ, na sīlasampadānisaṁsaṁ, na samādhisampadānisaṁsaṁ, na ñāṇadassanānisaṁsaṁ.
analyzed: iti kho brāhmaṇa nayidam brahmacariyam na sīla sampadā anisasa na samādhi sampadā anisasa na ñāṇa dassana anisasa

original: Yā ca kho ayaṁ, brāhmaṇa, akuppā cetovimutti—
analyzed: yā ca kho brāhmaṇa akuppā cetas vimutti

original: etadatthamidaṁ, brāhmaṇa, brahmacariyaṁ, etaṁ sāraṁ etaṁ pariyosānan”ti.
analyzed: brāhmaṇa brahmacariye etam sāram etam

original: Evaṁ vutte, piṅgalakoccho brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: evam vutte piṅgalakocchaḥ brāhmaṇaḥ bhagavantam etat avoca

original: “abhikkantaṁ, bho gotama, abhikkantaṁ, bho gotama …pe…
analyzed: abhikkanta bho gotama abhikkanta bho gotama pe

original: upāsakaṁ maṁ bhavaṁ gotamo dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupetaṁ saraṇaṁ gatan”ti.
analyzed: upāsakam mam bhavam gotamaḥ dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupetam saraṇam gatanti

original: Cūḷasāropamasuttaṁ niṭṭhitaṁ dasamaṁ.
analyzed: cūḷasāropama suttam niṭṭhitam dasama

original: Opammavaggo niṭṭhito tatiyo.
analyzed: opamma vaggo niṭṭhitaḥ tatiyaḥ

original: Tassuddānaṁ
analyzed: tassa uddāna

original: Moḷiyaphaggunariṭṭhañca nāmo,
analyzed: nāmo

original: Andhavane kathipuṇṇaṁ nivāpo;
analyzed: andhavane kathipuṇṇam nivāpaḥ

original: Rāsikaṇerumahāgajanāmo,
analyzed: rāsi kaṇeru mahāgaja nāmo

original: Sārūpamo puna piṅgalakoccho.
analyzed: sārūpamaḥ puna
